title: My ranked team didn't get LP
body: We played a game and won. Then after we saw that Ranked Team Queues were disabled, and we got 0 LP. Could we maybe get that LP back?     {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
same thing with our team, posted a thing about it some hours ago
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/iQAvmgro-ranked-5-promotionlp-problem
Hopefully we hear back from RIOT about this problem.
